columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the key version.

columns.name: key_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the key.

columns.name: key_id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a key uniquely.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a key version uniquely.

columns.name: vault_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the vault.

columns.name: enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the key version is enabled, or not.

columns.name: key_type
columns.description: The type of the key. Possible values are: 'EC', 'ECHSM', 'RSA', 'RSAHSM'.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Specifies the time when the key version is created.

columns.name: curve_name
columns.description: The elliptic curve name. Possible values are: 'P256', 'P384', 'P521', 'P256K'.

columns.name: expires_at
columns.description: Specifies the time when the key version wil expire.

columns.name: key_size
columns.description: The key size in bits.

columns.name: key_uri
columns.description: The URI to retrieve the current version of the key.

columns.name: key_uri_with_version
columns.description: The URI to retrieve the specific version of the key.

columns.name: location
columns.description: Azure location of the key vault resource.

columns.name: not_before
columns.description: Specifies the time before which the key version is not usable.

columns.name: recovery_level
columns.description: The deletion recovery level currently in effect for the object. If it contains 'Purgeable', then the object can be permanently deleted by a privileged user; otherwise, only the system can purge the object at the end of the retention interval.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the resource

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Specifies the time when the key was last updated.

columns.name: key_ops
columns.description: A list of key operations.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
